results.name: Triangle read by rows, A000012 * (2*A144328 - A000012)
comment: The operation (2*A144328 - A000012) creates a crescendo triangle with the first n terms of the sequence (1, 1, 3, 5, 7,...) as the n-th row.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_ & _Roger L. Bagula_, Sep 18 2008
